FuncDef: The reset feature-software next-startup command deletes the feature package files to be used after the device restarts in batches. The reset feature-software next-startup command deletes the feature package files to be used after the device restarts in batches. By default, the feature packages that are started after the device restarts are cleared in batches or as specified.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify the file name, in the format of [drive][path][file name].
The value is a string of 5 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: After running the startup feature-software command (in batches) to specify the feature package file for next startup, you can run the reset feature-software next-startup command (in batches) to clear the configuration.
